column5: Well my last week was a awesome week for Kings on Lake Ontario...but due to lots of Walleye being caught I had to pull the boat home to start my Walleye charters...and lets just say Erie is on fire ...but it would be nice if the WIND would go away Lake Erie has been rough pretty much everyday ...here are a few pictures ill try to add more soon as i find my camera ... Slide Show  Walleye Spread Big Dipsys 2setting 95and 105 back has been hot ...Off the boards small dipsys on a 2 setting 200 to 275 back all with my home made harness ...Gold and Pinks have been good ...
Nice slide show, and good luck with the walleye
Awesome slide show - and thanks for the tips!  :-)
